name: vim-stylus
description:
Syntax hightlighting for Stylus
  - http://learnboost.github.com/stylus/

CSS3/HTML5 bundled in and adapted from css3.vim by Hsiaoming Young
  - http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=3042

Report issues and follow updates at:
  - https://github.com/wavded/vim-stylus
install_details:
Manual install
  - Unzip into your .vim directory
Pathogen install
  - Clone https://github.com/wavded/vim-stylus into your bundle directory
